channel.title: Others can't log in - Connecting to update server
channel.description:
Hi guys,
My friend and I are trying to run a 508. I downloaded all the things I needed. However, everytime he tries to connect to my server, he always get that "Connecting to update server" error.
I'm sure you guys already had that error before. If you know how to fix it, please tell me. I really need to know. If we didnt' tried 100 times to run a 508 server, we didn't tried once.
I've done it before, but we just gave up after a while. But now we want to start all over again with a different source.
Okay well, any help as soon as possible would be much appreciated.

item.title: Others can't log in - Connecting to update server
item.dc:creator: @Macoronizer Macoronizer
item.description:
@Macoronizer wrote:

what client is it make sure u put your address for the client to connect to you portfowarded correctly and your no-ip is updated properly it should work or is that your client needs the 508 cache if you can show me the error that would be great

Thanks for the reply, hope you can help me.

Okay, he’s using this client. http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,345782.0.html

I don’t know if it’s berky’s client or whatever. The error is just that it loads like half way, then it stops to “Connecting to update server”.

Also, I’m using Berky-Scape for the source.

Read full topic
item.source: Others can't log in - Connecting to update server
